scripts.start: APP_ENV=production npx next build && npx next start
scripts.start:staging: APP_ENV=staging npx next build && npx next start
scripts.export: APP_ENV=production npx next build && npx next export; cp .htaccess-out ./out/.htaccess
scripts.export:staging: APP_ENV=staging npx next build && npx next export; cp .htaccess-out ./out/.htaccess
